item.description:
@cameron @elonmusk @DrEliDavid ‚ÄúShow us your transaction ledger‚Äù is the new ‚Äúshow us your tax returns‚Äù

item.title: #en @ 1456298680705818630
item.description:
How much does the lack of open data in traditional finance obfuscate price discovery and create proprietary data driven asymmetric strategies?
If any amount, would completely open and transparent financial systems solve this?
I don't have an answer here.
